instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Chinese language.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Chinese language.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Chinese language.
input: Iran has continually maintained that it seeks only to develop nuclear technology for the production of electrical power, though this has been disputed by many nations.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Chinese language.
input: The attack occurred as Ecclestone visited his company's office with girlfriend Fabiana Flosi—who was reportedly "shaken" but uninjured—in central London.
